alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 12:34PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Diego County through 115 PM PDT... At 1233 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campo, or 7 miles southeast of I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard. This storm was nearly stationary and drifting south. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line, Boulevard, Lake Morena, Potrero, Campo, La Posta Indian Reservation, Tierra Del Sol, Campo Indian Reservation, Tecate, Live Oak Springs, Manzanita Indian Reservation and Jacumba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
